cards.markdown:
I’m really looking forward to [this](http://www.thesocialnetwork-movie.com/):
Yes, it’s a dramatisation of the founding of Facebook, based on the hugely entertaining book [The Accidental Billionaires: Sex, Money, Betrayal and the Founding of Facebook](http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/0434019550?ie=UTF8&tag=fishnefedora-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1634&creative=19450&creativeASIN=0434019550)![](), which I read and enjoyed last year. Highly Recommended.
